name: Amber Wood Perfume
desc: A luxurious blend of deep amber, warm vanilla, and rich aged woods. This perfume creates a sophisticated and elegant aura, perfect for special occasions and evening wear.

name: Rose Musk Eau De Parfum
desc: An enchanting fragrance that intertwines delicate floral rose notes with a sensual musk undertone. Ideal for those who appreciate timeless elegance and romance.

name: Sandalwood Bliss Perfume
desc: A soothing fusion of creamy sandalwood, soft floral undertones, and a hint of citrus. Designed for daily wear, bringing a sense of calm and serenity throughout the day.

name: Ocean Breeze Cologne
desc: A refreshing aquatic fragrance that embodies the cool essence of ocean waves and salty breezes. Infused with citrus and marine notes for a fresh and energetic vibe.

name: Mystic Oud Perfume
desc: An alluring oud-based perfume with a warm, woody aroma blended with hints of spice and floral undertones. Perfect for those who love a deep and exotic fragrance.

name: Lavender Bliss Bathing Oil
desc: A calming bathing oil enriched with pure lavender extracts to relax the mind and nourish the skin. Leaves you feeling refreshed and rejuvenated after every bath.

name: Vanilla Spice Scented Candle
desc: A warm and cozy candle infused with the soothing aroma of vanilla and a hint of spice. Creates a comforting atmosphere perfect for relaxation and unwinding.

name: Rose Glow Hydrating Face Serum
desc: A lightweight, deeply hydrating serum enriched with rose extracts and vitamins. Helps rejuvenate skin, leaving it soft, radiant, and nourished.

name: Argan Oil Hair Nourishing Serum
desc: A premium hair serum infused with argan oil, providing deep nourishment, frizz control, and a silky shine. Strengthens hair and promotes healthier growth.

name: Golden Musk Luxury Perfume
desc: A rich and luxurious blend of golden musk and subtle floral notes. A fragrance that exudes elegance and confidence, suitable for any occasion.

name: Herbal Infusion Bath Salt
desc: A relaxing blend of mineral-rich salts infused with essential oils and herbs. Helps detoxify the body and soothe muscles for a spa-like bathing experience.

name: Cinnamon & Clove Aromatic Candle
desc: A warm and cozy candle infused with rich cinnamon and spicy clove notes. Perfect for creating a comforting and festive ambiance in any space.

name: Vitamin C Brightening Face Cream
desc: A nourishing face cream packed with Vitamin C and antioxidants to enhance radiance, even out skin tone, and provide long-lasting hydration.

name: Keratin Infused Hair Serum
desc: A powerful hair serum enriched with keratin to strengthen strands, reduce frizz, and restore shine for silky, healthy-looking hair.

name: Citrus Bloom Eau De Parfum
desc: A fresh and vibrant fragrance combining zesty citrus notes with delicate floral undertones. A perfect pick for a refreshing and energetic start to the day.

name: Aloe & Green Tea Body Wash
desc: A soothing body wash infused with aloe vera and green tea extracts to cleanse, refresh, and hydrate the skin while providing a calming aroma.

name: Lavender & Vanilla Scented Candle
desc: A soothing candle that combines the relaxing aroma of lavender with the sweet warmth of vanilla, perfect for unwinding after a long day.

desc: A lightweight mist packed with hyaluronic acid to instantly refresh and hydrate your skin, leaving it plump and glowing throughout the day.

name: Coconut & Argan Oil Hair Mask
